info.title: Amadeus Relay
info.description: The Amadeus Relay is a relayer working on top of 0x Project (https://0xproject.com). It expects to offer dApps a simple, fast and trustworthy source to use 0x to seamlessly exchange ERC20 tokens. It focus mostly on: provide the most accurate and liquidable market values of assets to dApps willing to use it; and to adhere to the Standard Relayer API (https://github.com/0xProject/standard-relayer-api) so that dApps have a common and knowable interface to work with.

400.description: A parameter is not informed correctly.

get.description:
Calling this method will return signed orders that can be filled through 0x project's fillOrder to exchange user's takerToken for this relayer's makerToken.
This method follows the specifications of the Standard Relayer API v0 as proposed by the 0x Projext team (https://github.com/0xProject/standard-relayer-api).
get.summary: List all orders available through our relayer, given the searched parameters.

parameters.description: Will return all orders created to this contract address.
parameters.name: exchangeContractAddress

parameters.description: Will return all orders where makerTokenAddress or takerTokenAddress is token address.
parameters.name: tokenAddress

parameters.description: Will return all orders where makerTokenAddress is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: makerTokenAddress

parameters.description: Will return all orders where takerTokenAddress is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: takerTokenAddress

parameters.description: Will return all orders where makerAddress is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: maker

parameters.description: Will return all orders where takerAddress is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: taker

parameters.description: Will return all orders where makerAddress or takerAddress is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: trader

parameters.description: Will return all orders where feeRecipient is the same address of this parameter.
parameters.name: feeRecipient

parameters.description: Which page should be returned. If this parameter is not informed, then it will take the default value of 1. Page numbers start at 1.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of orders that should be returned on each page. If this parameter is not informed, then it will take the default value of the total number of orders found.
parameters.name: per_page

400.description: A parameter is not informed correctly.

get.description: This method follows the specifications of the Standard Relayer API v0 as proposed by the 0x Projext team (https://github.com/0xProject/standard-relayer-api).
get.summary: Lists all available trading pairs that this relayer current supports.

parameters.description: Address of a token that could be on either side of the trade: either as a maker, or as a taker.
parameters.name: tokenA

parameters.description: Address of a token that could be on either side of the trade: either as a maker, or as a taker.
parameters.name: tokenB

parameters.description: Which page should be returned. If this parameter is not informed, then it will take the default value of 1. Page numbers start at 1.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of token pairs that should be returned on each page. If this parameter is not informed, then it will take the default value of the total number of token pairs found.
parameters.name: per_page
